name: MyJadebyJadeDiabetes
0:
”Alexa ask my jade for my blood sugar”
”Alexa ask my jade to log twenty grams”
”Alexa ask my jade for active insulin”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my jade
Developer Terms of Use
des:
My Jade lets you calculate insulin doses, find your current blood sugar, predict future blood sugars and log data like blood sugars, carbs, insulin, blood pressure and exercise. You can even undo the last log.

Try:
Alexa open My Jade 
Alexa ask My Jade to add twenty grams
Alexa ask My Jade to add 2.5 units insulin
Alexa ask My Jade to add 20 units lantus
Alexa ask My Jade to dose for 30 grams
Alexa ask My Jade to dose for 30 grams and blood sugar of 200
Alexa ask My Jade to log 1 hour of skiing
Alexa tell My Jade I feel low
Alexa ask My Jade undo 
 
This skill is part of the Jade Diabetes ecosystem - multiple apps, web portals and integrations with Dexcom, FreeStyle Libre, Apple Health, NightScout and more.

You can find out more about Jade Diabetes at:
* https://www.JadeDiabetes.com/alexa
* iTunes - http://itunes.apple.com/app/id980437930
* Google Play - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.managebgl.predictbgl2

We help real people with real information to live safer, easier lives with diabetes.

FEATURES

� Designed for type 1s, type 2s, type 1.5 / LADA, gestational diabetes
� Logger
 - multiple carb ratios and correction ratios
 - multiple BG targets
 - tracks active insulin / insulin on board in the same way as a pump
� mg/dL or mmol/L blood glucose units
� Carbs in grams, portions, exchanges, BE, KE, CC

Jade does not provide medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition. Never disregard professional medical advice or delay in seeking it because of information contained in Jade content provided through Amazon Alexa.
